All eligible subject receive CCRT administer curative intent accord institutional/national guideline well meet minimum standard define protocol . Thereafter , subject receive study treatment every 8 week total 5 dos disease recurrence . Subjects receive 7-day course oral antibiotic placebo start 72 hour follow completion study treatment administration .
